    BaseService.getHelper(Agent a)
    This should be properly implemented by the services that have helpers.
    abstract ServiceHelper
    FEService.getHelper(Agent a)
    Subclasses must implement this method to return the helper for accessing this service.

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    SAMHelper
    Helper interface for the System Activity Monitoring (SAM) Service.
    The SAM Service allows collecting system activity information such as the average time to perform a given operations or the number of events of a given type.
